titleStmt.title: By the King whereas seuerall troopes and companies of our subiects, English and Scottish souldiers, lately imployed in the seruice of the States Generall of the United Prouinces ... returne daily home ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Pallace of Westminster, the twenty seuenth day of December, in the Fifth yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
